titles: To the most illustrious, John, Earle of Lauderdale, &c. His Majesties High Commissioner for the kingdom of Scotland, His Grace, a congratulatory welcome of an heart-well-wishing quill: hecatombe.
author: Murray, Mungo, 17th cent.
notes: End of text signed: M. M.
